data.name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? : Japanese Audio with English Subtitles: (Under Resort) THE LABYRINTH PARADISE
data.short_description: Bell’s party struggles to reach the 18th floor, a safe zone. After what they’ve been through, the sanctuary of what adventurers call "Under Resort" will be a welcome respite.
